channel.title: 3mpwr App - Curated Disability News
channel.description: Daily curated news on disability rights, accessibility, and benefits across Canada

item.title: Governments Of Canada and Manitoba Strengthening Justice for Canada's First Responders
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Former Para skier Marcoux named honorary captain of Canada’s Paralympic team for Milan-Cortina Games
item.description: Former Para alpine skier Mac Marcoux has been named the honorary captain of Canada’s Paralympic team for the Milan-Cortina Games, the Canadian Paralympic Committee announced Wednesday.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Federal investigation probes grocery store competition in Halifax
item.description: Since last year, an investigation into the ability of new grocers to set up in the Halifax Regional Municipality has been quietly ticking along under Competition Bureau Canada.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Manitoba Government Expands Care for Dialysis Patients and Mothers in Norway House Cree Nation
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Resolutions on coal, flags and more up for debate at Alberta UCP annual meeting
item.description: The pitches, another being to make temporary residents pay for health care, were released recently by the party.

item.title: Manitoba Government Invests More Than $1.3 Million for Community Revitalization Projects in Westman

item.title: Manitoba Government to Help Students Learn About Climate Change and Climate Action in Schools
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Montreal transit strike: Service to ‘resume gradually' as job action ends
item.description: A strike by the Montreal transit agency’s 2,400 maintenance workers, which limited bus and subway service to peak hours and late evenings, was scheduled to last until Nov. 28.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Ukraine’s foreign minister to meet top diplomats at G7 meeting in Niagara
item.description: The Russian attacks have brought rolling blackouts to Ukraine as winter approaches and U.S.-led diplomatic efforts remain at a standstill.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Photos: Atlanta rapper JID makes the most of a Monday night PNE Forum crowd
item.description: The artist brought the crowd to its feet.

item.title: The Beaches make a play for Canadian rock royalty at Doug Mitchell
item.description: The Beaches are making more than just waves.
